###### Requirements with Version Specifiers ######
numpy >=1.22
numba >=0.55.2
scipy >=1.8.1
matplotlib >=3.5.2
emcee >=3.1.2
astropy >=5.1
astroquery >=0.4
oyaml >= 1.0
###### Requirements without Version Specifiers ######
scikit-learn
argparse
h5py
tqdm
pygtc
PyDE @ git+https://github.com/hpparvi/PyDE.git
